metadata.title: CVE-2024-26327 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in QEMU 7.1.0 through 8.2.1. register_vfs inhw/pci/pcie_sriov.c mishandles the situation where a guest writes NumVFsgreater than TotalVFs, leading to a buffer overflow in VF implementations.

criterions.comment: qemu package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-02-19').
